languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, на связи Инфернус-мастер Монтэг. Я молю вас вмешаться в ход так называемого "расследования", устроенного Мастером дисциплины. Блюстители свирепствуют: избивают людей, морят голодом и жаждой. Ваши слуги гибнут зря просто потому, что госпожа Зауэрбэк желает выслужиться. Я уверен, что при вас они не посмеют устраивать эти зверства или, по крайней мере, остудят свой пыл!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Infernus Master Monteg. I urge you to intervene in the so-called 'investigation' that the Master-at-Arms has organised. The enforcers are out of control: they're assaulting people, depriving them of food and water. Your servants are dying for no reason other than Mistress Sauerback's desire to impress you. I'm sure that they wouldn't dare terrorise them in your presence, or at least they would show some restraint!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, на связи Инфернус-мастер Монтэг. Я молю вас вмешаться в ход так называемого "расследования", устроенного Мастером дисциплины. I'm sure that they wouldn't dare terrorise them in your presence, or at least they would show some restraint!"

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, al habla el maestro de infernus Monteg. L{mf|e|a} insto a intervenir en la supuesta investigación que ha organizado la maestra de armas. Los guardias están fuera de control: agreden a la gente y le retiran el acceso a agua y comida. Sus sirvientes están muriendo porque la maestra Sauerback quiere impresionarl{mf|e|a}. Estoy seguro de que no se atreverían a realizar esos abusos en su presencia, ¡o al menos se contendrían un poco!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Infernus Master Monteg. I urge you to intervene in the so-called 'investigation' that the Master-at-Arms has organised. The enforcers are out of control: they're assaulting people, depriving them of food and water. Your servants are dying for no reason other than Mistress Sauerback's desire to impress you. I'm sure that they wouldn't dare terrorise them in your presence, or at least they would show some restraint!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, al habla el maestro de infernus Monteg. L{mf|e|a} insto a intervenir en la supuesta investigación que ha organizado la maestra de armas. Los guardias están fuera de control: agreden a la gente y le retiran el acceso a agua y comida. Sus sirvientes están muriendo porque la maestra Sauerback quiere impresionarl{mf|e|a}. Estoy seguro de que no se atreverían a realizar esos abusos en su presencia, ¡o al menos se contendrían un poco!».

languages.text: 「陛下、こちらインフェルヌス・マスターのモンテグです。マスター・アット・アームズが進める『調査』なるモノに介入することを、強く進言します。エンフォーサーたちはやりたい放題です。民を襲って、食べ物や水を奪っています。あなたの従者たちは、他でもなく、ザウアーバック氏のあなたに評価されたいという想いのせいで命を落とすのです。あなたの目の前で、そんなテロ行為は行わないでしょう。それか、少なくとも抑えた行動をとるはずです！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Infernus Master Monteg. I urge you to intervene in the so-called 'investigation' that the Master-at-Arms has organised. The enforcers are out of control: they're assaulting people, depriving them of food and water. Your servants are dying for no reason other than Mistress Sauerback's desire to impress you. I'm sure that they wouldn't dare terrorise them in your presence, or at least they would show some restraint!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、こちらインフェルヌス・マスターのモンテグです。マスター・アット・アームズが進める『調査』なるモノに介入することを、強く進言します。エンフォーサーたちはやりたい放題です。民を襲って、食べ物や水を奪っています。あなたの従者たちは、他でもなく、ザウアーバック氏のあなたに評価されたいという想いのせいで命を落とすのです。あなたの目の前で、そんなテロ行為は行わないでしょう。それか、少なくとも抑えた行動をとるはずです！」

languages.text: “大人，这里是控火大师蒙特格。我强烈要求您介入戒律大师组织的所谓‘调查工作’。那些执法者简直无法无天。他们袭击无辜的人们，不给他们吃东西，也不让他们喝水。您的仆人白白丧命，只因为苏尔贝克女士想给您留下个好印象。我相信，如果您能出面的话，他们肯定不敢继续这么胡作非为，或者至少会克制些！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Infernus Master Monteg. I urge you to intervene in the so-called 'investigation' that the Master-at-Arms has organised. The enforcers are out of control: they're assaulting people, depriving them of food and water. Your servants are dying for no reason other than Mistress Sauerback's desire to impress you. I'm sure that they wouldn't dare terrorise them in your presence, or at least they would show some restraint!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，这里是控火大师蒙特格。我强烈要求您介入戒律大师组织的所谓‘调查工作’。那些执法者简直无法无天。他们袭击无辜的人们，不给他们吃东西，也不让他们喝水。您的仆人白白丧命，只因为苏尔贝克女士想给您留下个好印象。我相信，如果您能出面的话，他们肯定不敢继续这么胡作非为，或者至少会克制些！”

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, hier spricht Infernus-Meister Monteg. Ich bitte Euch inständig, Euch in diese so genannten 'Ermittlungen' einzuschalten, die die Master-at-Arms organisiert hat. Die Enforcers sind außer Kontrolle: Sie wenden Gewalt gegen die Leute an, verwehren ihnen Nahrung und Wasser. Eure Diener sterben einzig und allein, weil Herrin Sauerback Euch zu beeindrucken versucht. Sie würden es gewiss nicht wagen, die Arbeiter in Eurer Gegenwart zu terrorisieren, oder zumindest würden sie ein wenig Zurückhaltung zeigen!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Infernus Master Monteg. I urge you to intervene in the so-called 'investigation' that the Master-at-Arms has organised. The enforcers are out of control: they're assaulting people, depriving them of food and water. Your servants are dying for no reason other than Mistress Sauerback's desire to impress you. I'm sure that they wouldn't dare terrorise them in your presence, or at least they would show some restraint!"

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, hier spricht Infernus-Meister Monteg. Ich bitte Euch inständig, Euch in diese so genannten 'Ermittlungen' einzuschalten, die die Master-at-Arms organisiert hat. Die Enforcers sind außer Kontrolle: Sie wenden Gewalt gegen die Leute an, verwehren ihnen Nahrung und Wasser. Eure Diener sterben einzig und allein, weil Herrin Sauerback Euch zu beeindrucken versucht. Sie würden es gewiss nicht wagen, die Arbeiter in Eurer Gegenwart zu terrorisieren, oder zumindest würden sie ein wenig Zurückhaltung zeigen!"

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, ici le maître-infernus Monteg. Je vous demande instamment d'intervenir dans la soi-disant enquête menée par la capitaine d'armes. Les prévôts sont hors de contrôle : ils passent les gens à tabac, et les privent d'eau et de nourriture. Sauerback laisse mourir vos serviteurs dans le seul et unique but de vous impressionner. Je suis sûr que ces brutes n'oseraient pas s'en prendre ainsi à vos sujets en votre présence, ou qu'ils feraient tout du moins preuve d'un peu plus de retenue ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Infernus Master Monteg. I urge you to intervene in the so-called 'investigation' that the Master-at-Arms has organised. The enforcers are out of control: they're assaulting people, depriving them of food and water. Your servants are dying for no reason other than Mistress Sauerback's desire to impress you. I'm sure that they wouldn't dare terrorise them in your presence, or at least they would show some restraint!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, ici le maître-infernus Monteg. Je vous demande instamment d'intervenir dans la soi-disant enquête menée par la capitaine d'armes. Je suis sûr que ces brutes n'oseraient pas s'en prendre ainsi à vos sujets en votre présence, ou qu'ils feraient tout du moins preuve d'un peu plus de retenue ! »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, İtfa Üstadı Monteg'i takdim edeyim. Silahtar'ın organize ettiği sözüm ona 'sorguya' müdahale etmeniz için yalvarıyorum. İnfazcılar kontrolden çıktı. İnsanlara saldırıp onları yiyecek ve sudan mahrum bırakıyorlar. Hizmetkârlarınız, Sauerback Hanım'ın sizi etkileme arzusu sonucunda can veriyor. Eminim ki huzurunuzda onları korkutmaya cüret edemezler ya da en azından kendilerine biraz hâkim olurlar!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, this is Infernus Master Monteg. I urge you to intervene in the so-called 'investigation' that the Master-at-Arms has organised. The enforcers are out of control: they're assaulting people, depriving them of food and water. Your servants are dying for no reason other than Mistress Sauerback's desire to impress you. I'm sure that they wouldn't dare terrorise them in your presence, or at least they would show some restraint!"
